name: UIUserNotificationSettings
desc: Important: UIUserNotificationSettings is deprecated in iOS 10. Use UNNotificationSettings instead. A UIUserNotificationSettings object encapsulates the types of notifications that can be displayed to the user by your app.

items.name: init(types: UIUserNotificationType, categories: Set<UIUserNotificationCategory>?)
items.desc: Creates and returns a settings object that you can use to register your requested notification and action types.

items.name: var types: UIUserNotificationType
items.desc: A bitmask of the notification types that your app is allowed to use.

items.name: var categories: Set<UIUserNotificationCategory>?
items.desc: The appâ€™s registered groups of actions.

items.name: struct UIUserNotificationType
items.desc: Constants indicating how the app alerts the user when a local or push notification arrives.
